condition.name: Ablaze
entries: While you have the Ablaze condition, you experience the following effects.

entries.name: Ongoing Fire Damage
entries: You are engulfed in flames and take 5 Fire damage at the start of each of your turns. You can use your Action to muffle and extinguish the flames, ending the condition.

condition.name: Steeled
entries: While you have the Steeled condition, you experience the following effects.

entries.name: Electric Attractiveness
entries: Attacks that deal Electric damage have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} against you.

entries.name: Saving Throws Affected
entries: You make saving throws against effects that deal Electric damage with {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

condition.name: Confused
entries: While you have the Confused condition, you experience the following effects.

entries.name: Behavior Restrictions
entries: You can't take Bonus Actions or Reactions and must roll {@dice 1d10} at the start of each of your turns to determine your behavior for that turn, consulting the table below.

rows: You don't take an action, and you use all your movement to move. Roll {@dice 1d4} for the direction: {@b 1}, ↑ north; {@b 2}, → east; {@b 3}, ↓ south; or {@b 4}, ← west.
You don't move or take actions.
You don't move, and you take the {@action Attack} action to make one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If none are within reach, you take no action.

condition.name: Oiled
entries: While you have the Oiled condition, you experience the following effects.

entries.name: Grapples Affected
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} in Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws} against being Grappled and {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) checks to escape grapples (See {@action Escape a Grapple}).

entries.name: Inflammable
entries: If you take Fire damage, you take an additional 5 Fire damage.

condition.name: Drenched
entries: While you have the Drenched condition, you experience the following effects.

entries.name: Fire Resistance
entries: You have resistance to Fire damage.

entries.name: Electroconductive
entries: If you take Electric damage, you take an additional 5 Electric damage.

entries.name: Interaction with Ablaze
entries: If you would gain the {@condition Ablaze|CompendiumofAcadia} condition, you instead lose the Drenched condition and do not gain Ablaze.
